mapper.insert: INSERT INTO articles (title, content, description, url, thumbnail_url, author, published_at, feed_id, category_id, sources_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{description}, #{url}, #{thumbnailUrl}, #{author}, #{publishedAt}, #{feedId}, #{categoryId}, #{sourcesId}, NOW(), NOW()) ON CONFLICT (url) DO NOTHING
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, description, url, thumbnail_url AS thumbnailUrl, author, published_at AS publishedAt, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt, feed_id AS feedId, category_id AS categoryId, sources_id AS sourcesId FROM articles WHERE embedding IS NULL AND sources_id = #{sourceId} ORDER BY id ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE articles SET embedding = #{embedding,jdbcType=OTHER}::vector, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
